description.english: Make it through your first night in Los Ojos.
description.german: Überstehe die erste Nacht in Los Ojos.
description.french: Arriver au bout de votre première nuit à Los Ojos.
description.italian: Supera la tua prima notte a Los Ojos.
description.koreana: 로스오호스에서의 첫 번째 밤을 무사히 보냅니다.
description.spanish: Completa tu primera noche en Los Ojos.
description.japanese: ロス・オジョスでの初めての夜を乗り切る。
description.dutch: Kom je eerste avond in Los Ojos door.
description.brazilian: Passe sua primeira noite em Los Ojos.

description.english: Find the underground night club Savy mentioned.
description.german: Suche den Untergrund-Nachtclub, den Savy erwähnt hat.
description.french: Trouver la boîte underground dont Savy a parlé.
description.italian: Trova il night club underground di cui parlava Savy.
description.spanish: Encuentra el club nocturno clandestino que te comentó Savy.
description.schinese: 找出萨薇提过的地下夜店。
description.tchinese: 找出薩薇提過的地下夜店。
description.russian: Отыщите подпольный ночной клуб, о котором говорила Сэви.
description.japanese: サビーに言われた地下ナイトクラブを見つける。
description.dutch: Ga naar de verborgen nachtclub waar Savy het over had.
description.turkish: Savy'nin bahsettiği gizli gece kulübünü bul.
description.brazilian: Encontre a boate alternativa de que Savy falou.

description.english: Discover where Savy was working when she disappeared.
description.german: Finde heraus, wo Savy arbeitete, als sie verschwand.
description.french: Découvrir où Savy travaillait quand elle a disparu.
description.italian: Scopri dove lavorava Savy quando è scomparsa.
description.koreana: 세이비가 행방불명됐을 때 어디 근무하고 있었는지 알아냅니다.
description.spanish: Descubre dónde estaba trabajando Savy cuando desapareció.
description.schinese: 找出萨薇消失时的工作地点。
description.tchinese: 找出薩薇消失時的工作地點。
description.russian: Выясните, где работала Сэви до исчезновения.
description.japanese: 失踪時、サビーが働いていた場所を突きとめる。
description.dutch: Ontdek waar Savy werkte toen ze verdween.
description.turkish: Kaybolmadan önce Savy'nin nerede çalıştığını öğren.
description.brazilian: Descubra onde Savy estava trabalhando quando desapareceu.

description.english: Convinced Savy to finally let you know she's alive.
description.german: Überrede Savy, dich endlich wissen zu lassen, dass sie lebt.
description.french: Convaincre Savy de donner signe de vie.
description.italian: Convinci Savy a farsi viva, finalmente.
description.koreana: 세이비를 설득해서 자기가 살아 있다는 소식을 전하게 만듭니다.
description.spanish: Has convencido a Savy para que te confirme que está viva.
description.schinese: 说服萨维让您知晓她还活着。
description.tchinese: 說服薩薇讓您知曉她還活著。
description.russian: Убедите Сэви наконец дать вам знать, что она жива.
description.japanese: 無事を知らせるよう、サビーを説得できた。
description.dutch: Overtuig Savy je te laten weten dat ze nog leeft.
description.turkish: Savy'yi hayatta olduğundan seni haberdar etmeye nihayet ikna et.
description.brazilian: Convenceu Savy a finalmente mandar um sinal de vida.

description.english: Stay for the night at the bougiest hotel in Los Ojos.
description.german: Eine Nacht im schicksten Hotel in Los Ojos.
description.french: Passer la nuit à l'hôtel le plus chic de Los Ojos.
description.italian: Passa la notte nell'albergo più favoloso di Los Ojos.
description.spanish: Pasa la noche en el hotel más cotroso de Los Ojos.
description.schinese: 在洛荷斯最高级的饭店住一晚。
description.tchinese: 在洛荷斯最高級的飯店住一晚。
description.russian: Проведите ночь в роскошнейшем отеле Лос-Охоса.
description.japanese: ロス・オジョスの最高級ホテルで一夜を過ごす。
description.dutch: Verblijf een nacht in het meest luxe hotel van Los Ojos.
description.turkish: Geceyi Los Ojos'un en havalı otelinde geçir.
description.brazilian: Passe a noite no hotel mais burguês de Los Ojos.

description.english: Solve a medical mystery with Carlos.
description.german: Löse mit Carlos ein medizinisches Rätsel.
description.french: Résoudre un mystère médical avec Carlos.
description.italian: Risolvi un mistero della medicina con Carlos.
description.spanish: Resuelve un misterio médico con Carlos.
description.schinese: 与卡洛斯一起解开医学谜团。
description.tchinese: 與卡洛斯一起解開醫學謎團。
description.russian: Разгадайте медицинскую загадку вместе с Карлосом.
description.japanese: カルロスと医学のミステリーを解決する。
description.dutch: Los een medisch mysterie op met Carlos.
description.brazilian: Resolva um mistério médico com Carlos.

description.english: Stand up to Savy's emotional manipulation and win.
description.german: Halte Savys emotionaler Manipulation stand und gewinne.
description.french: Résister à la manipulation émotionnelle de Savy et gagner.
description.italian: Affronta la manipolazione emotiva di Savy e vinci.
description.koreana: 감정적으로 당신을 조종하려 하는 세이비에 맞서 승리합니다.
description.spanish: Resiste a la manipulación emocional de Savy y gana.
description.schinese: 对抗萨薇的情绪勒索并获胜。
description.tchinese: 對抗薩薇的情緒勒索並獲勝。
description.russian: Не поддайтесь на эмоциональные манипуляции Сэви и одержите победу.
description.japanese: サビーの感情操作に抵抗し、勝利する。
description.dutch: Verzet je tegen Savy's emotionele manipulatie en win.
description.turkish: Savy'nin duygusal manipülasyonlarına karşı koy ve kazan.
description.brazilian: Enfrente a manipulação emocional de Savy e vença.

description.german: Schlag dein Feelgrid kurz und klein.
description.italian: Fai a pezzi il tuo Feelgrid.

description.english: Leak the stolen docs and swing the Sophie's Law vote against Capra.
description.german: Leake die gestohlenen Dokumente und beeinflusse die Abstimmung zu Sophies Gesetz zu Capras Ungunsten.
description.french: Diffuser les documents volés et faire basculer le vote de la Loi de Sophie en défaveur de Capra.
description.italian: Fai trapelare i documenti rubati e fai pendere il voto sul decreto Sophie contro Capra.
description.koreana: 도난 문서를 유출하여 소피의 법안 투표를 카프라에게 불리하게 만듭니다.
description.spanish: Filtra los documentos robados y consigue que la votación de la Ley Sophie no favorezca a Capra.
description.schinese: 泄漏偷来的档案，将苏菲法的投票风向带成反卡步拉。
description.tchinese: 洩漏偷來的檔案，將蘇菲法的投票風向帶成反卡步拉。
description.russian: Обнародуйте украденные документы, чтобы голосование по закону Софи обернулось против Капры.
description.japanese: 盗難ドキュメントをリークし、ソフィー法の投票を反対に動かす。
description.dutch: Lek de gestolen documenten en verander de stem voor de Wet van Sophie naar Tegen.
description.turkish: Çalınan dokümanları sızdır ve Sophie Kanunu oylamasını Capra aleyhine çevir.
description.brazilian: Vaze os documentos roubados e faça a votação da Lei Sophie pender contra a Capra.

description.english: Clean up backseat vomit, a rite of passage for all drivers
description.german: Säubere den Rücksitz von Erbrochenem. Da muss jeder Fahrer durch.
description.french: Nettoyer le vomi sur le siège arrière, un rite de passage chez les chauffeurs !
description.italian: Pulisci del vomito sul sedile posteriore. È un rito di passaggio per tutti gli autisti.
description.koreana: 뒷좌석의 토사물을 치웁니다. 운전기사에게는 통과 의례나 마찬가지죠.
description.spanish: Limpia el vómito del asiento de atrás. ¡Un rito de iniciación para todos los conductores!
description.schinese: 清理后座的呕吐物，所有司机必经的成长仪式
description.tchinese: 清理後座的嘔吐物，所有司機必經的成長儀式。
description.russian: Отчистите заднее сиденье от блевотины. Все водители делают это.
description.japanese: ドライバーの通過儀礼である後部座席のゲロを掃除する。
description.dutch: Ruim kots van de achterbank op, een ontgroening voor alle chauffeurs.
description.turkish: Tüm şoförler için bir geçiş ritüeli olarak, arka koltuktan kusmuk temizle.
description.brazilian: Limpe o vômito do banco de trás, um rito de passagem para todo motorista

description.french: Obtenir votre première évaluation à 5 étoiles.
description.italian: Ottieni la tua prima valutazione a 5 stelle.
description.spanish: Consigue tu primera valoración de 5 estrellas.
description.japanese: 初めて星5評価を受ける
description.dutch: Verdien je eerste beoordeling van 5 sterren.
description.brazilian: Ganhe sua primeira avaliação de 5 estrelas

displayName.spanish: La peor conductora de la historia

description.french: Obtenir votre première évaluation à 1 étoile.
description.italian: Ottieni la tua prima valutazione a 1 stella.
description.spanish: Consigue tu primera valoración de 1 estrella.
description.japanese: 初めて星1評価を受ける
description.dutch: Verdien je eerste beoordeling van 1 ster.
description.brazilian: Ganhe sua primeira avaliação de 1 estrela

description.english: Run completeley out of money and fuel
description.german: Lass Geld und Benzin vollkommen ausgehen.
description.french: Être complètement à court d'argent et de carburant.
description.italian: Resta completamente a secco di denaro e carburante.
description.schinese: 完全消耗完金钱和电量。
description.tchinese: 完全消耗完金錢和電量。
description.russian: Останьтесь без гроша в кармане и без горючего в баке.
description.japanese: お金と燃料が完全に尽きる
description.dutch: Heb helemaal geen geld of brandstof meer over.
description.brazilian: Fique totalmente sem dinheiro e sem combustível

description.english: Rescue Allie from the Radix protest.
description.french: Sauver Allie de la manif de Radix.
description.italian: Salva Allie dalla protesta di Radix.
description.spanish: Rescata a Allie en la manifestación de Radix.
description.schinese: 将艾莉救出拉敌克党抗议现场。
description.tchinese: 將艾莉救出拉敵克黨抗議現場。
description.japanese: Radixの抗議集会でアリーを助ける。
description.brazilian: Resgate Allie do protesto da Radix.

displayName.spanish: Va a ser que no, agente
displayName.brazilian: Seu guarda, eu não sou vagabundo

description.english: Refuse to play ball with a corrupt LOPD officer.
description.german: Verweigere die Kooperation mit einem korrupten LOPD-Officer.
description.french: Refuser de jouer le jeu avec un agent de la LOPD corrompu.
description.italian: Rifiuta di stare al gioco con un agente di polizia corrotto.
description.spanish: Niégate a seguirle el rollo a un policía corrupto de la policía de Los Ojos.
description.schinese: 拒绝与腐败的洛城警局警察合作。
description.tchinese: 拒絕與腐敗的洛城警局警察合作。
description.russian: Не поддайтесь на шантаж продажного копа.
description.japanese: LOPDの汚職警官に協力するのを拒む。
description.dutch: Weiger een spel te spelen met een corrupte politieagent.
description.turkish: Rüşvet yiyici LOPT memuruna boyun eğme.
description.brazilian: Recuse-se a entrar na onda de um policial corrupto do DPLO.

description.english: Help Gideon break out of her mech suit.
description.german: Hilf Gideon, aus ihrem Mech-Anzug auszubrechen.
description.french: Aider Gideon à s'évader de sa combinaison.
description.italian: Aiuta Gideon a scappare dalla sua tuta mech.
description.koreana: 기디언이 메크 슈트에서 벗어나게 해 줍니다.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Gideon a librarse de su mecatraje.
description.schinese: 帮助吉笛恩脱离机械衣。
description.tchinese: 幫助吉笛恩脫離機械衣。
description.japanese: ギデオンがメカスーツから出るのに手を貸す。
description.turkish: Gideon'ın mekanik zırhtan çıkmasına yardım et.
description.brazilian: Ajude Gideon a se livrar de seu traje mecânico.

description.english: Get fired by Neo Cab for sustaining an imperfect rating.
description.german: Lass dich wegen schlechter Bewertungen von Neo Cab feuern.
description.french: Se faire licencier par Neo Cab pour évaluation imparfaite prolongée.
description.italian: Fatti licenziare da Neo Cab per aver mantenuto una valutazione troppo bassa.
description.koreana: 낮은 평점을 유지하여 네오 캡에서 해고당합니다.
description.spanish: Te han despedido de Neo Cab por obtener una valoración imperfecta.
description.schinese: 保持不完美评分，以被霓欧出租车解雇。
description.tchinese: 保持不完美評分，以被霓歐計程車解雇。
description.russian: Вылетите из Неокэба из-за слишком низкого рейтинга.
description.japanese: 悪い評価が続き、Neo Cabをクビになる。
description.dutch: Word ontslagen door Neo Cab door een te lage beoordeling te behouden.
description.turkish: Kötü puanını sürdürerek Neo Cab'den kovul.
description.brazilian: Seja demitida da Neo Cab por manter uma avaliação imperfeita.
